snippet: Oregon State fired Craig Robinson after six seasons without making the N.C.A.A. tournament.
abstract: Oregon State fires men's basketball coach Craig Robinson, brother of first lady Michelle Obama, after six seasons without making the NCAA tournament; other college basketball news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and ZACH SCHONBRUN

lead_paragraph: Oregon State fired Craig Robinson after six seasons without making the N.C.A.A. tournament.
